title.narrative: COMMUNICATION AND ADVOCACY

description.narrative: By 2018, the activities of Communication, Communication for Development, Donor Partnership Management, and Innovative Initiatives are being implemented to achieve results for children., which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Adolescent Development, Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development, Cross-Sectoral Early Childhood Development, Early Childhood Development, Environmental Sustainability, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2018, 100% of the planned budget is mobilized from donors, and 100% of the expected Program Cooperation results are achieved

description.narrative: The high-level dialogue on children, adolescents and young people contributed to the development of Phase 2 of the national development plan (PSE) and the celebration of 60 years of UNICEF presence in Senegal strengthened UNICEF&39;s visibility and highlighted its role as a stable and reliable development partner on child rights | Status:Met | As-of Date:31/01/2019
